t:test_case.t:steps: 1.Admin login 2.Create test account 3.Use lmtp inject to inject the message

t:test_case.t:objective: Create setup for the Search Request
t:test_case.t:steps: 1. Login to the account. 2. Search mails to get the message-ids 3. Create 6 folders 4. Get the ids of various folders 5. Move some folder within other 6. Move the mails to different folders.

t:test_case.t:objective: Verify the results are correct for query using cc: and all folders
Verify the results are correct for query using to: and all folders
Verify the results are correct for query using cc: and all folders
Verify the results are correct for query using subject: and all folders
Verify the results are correct for query using content: and all folders
Verify the results are correct for query using from: OR any folders
Verify the results are correct for query using to: OR any folders
Verify the results are correct for query using cc: OR any folders
Verify the results are correct for query using subject: OR all folders
Verify the results are correct for query using content: OR all folders
